textos_fuente.text: Accessibility | Restaurant and Bar | American Social Skip to main content Order Online Our Menus Our Locations Private Events Gift Cards Boca Fort Lauderdale Miami Orlando Tampa Reservations What’s On About Us Catering Careers Contact Accessibility Our Menus Our Locations Private Events What’s On About Us Order Online Careers Contact Accessibility AMSO Accessibility American Social’s Commitment to Accessibility At American Social everyone is welcome and we want to ensure that all guests have full access to all of the products, services, and information offered at our restaurants – including our website. To that end, we have taken steps to maximize the accessibility of our website to work with industry-standard screen reading software. We have also upgraded the site to include contrast and font adjustments to make each page more easily navigable for our visually impaired guests. We completely understand that not everyone is similarly suited; there is no one-size-fits-all solution that will guarantee a flawless user experience for everyone or the computer hardware/software used to access this website. American Social, therefore, believes that communication with its guests is of paramount importance to enable us to appropriately respond to each guest’s unique circumstances. While we have made every effort to anticipate the needs of all of our guests, the only way we can know if a guest has encountered a barrier to accessing our website is if we are notified of the issue. Please rest assured that American Social is ready, willing, and able to offer auxiliary aids and services to all of our guests for the purpose of allowing them full and equal access to our website. For example, upon request we will have any portion of our website read aloud to our guests by a qualified reader to the extent such guests are otherwise unable to access the website. Our staff is also happy to assist guests with making reservations to the extent such guests encounter difficulty in scheduling a reservation through our website. Please use the “CONTACT” link at the top of this page to advise American Social of any accessibility barriers encountered by our guests. Alternatively, please feel free to email us at info@american.social or call us at the following numbers: (954) 764-7005 (Ft. Lauderdale); (305) 223-7004 (Miami); (813) 605-3333 (Tampa); (407) 454-9992 (Orlando), or (561) 486-5434 (Boca). Newsletter Sign Up Ft. Lauderdale Miami Tampa Orlando Boca Raton Email Address By signing up, you agree to e-mail marketing. You can opt-out at any time. Consenting to these technologies will allow us to process data such as browsing behavior or unique IDs on this site. Not consenting or withdrawing consent, may adversely affect certain features and functions. Functional Functional Always active The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network. Preferences Preferences The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user. Statistics Statistics The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you. Marketing Marketing The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. American Social Bar and Kitchen Company Overview, Contact Details & Competitors | LeadIQ Learn more at LeadIQ.com Start free Insights Similar companies Tech Stack Media & News Email Format FAQ Insights Geographic Expansion American Social's plans to open a new location in Orlando, in addition to existing sites in Fort Lauderdale, Miami, and Tampa, indicate continued regional growth opportunities. This expansion strategy presents potential sales prospects in new markets and partnership opportunities with local vendors and event organizers. Event Partnerships The company's recent collaboration with Miami Open and hosting of events like Rumba on the River highlight a strong focus on experiential marketing and event-driven foot traffic. This opens avenues for sponsoring or organizing similar events, promotions, and personalized brand activations targeting a vibrant, entertainment-seeking audience. Social Media Engagement With a tech stack that includes Google Tag Manager and present online marketing efforts, there is a significant opportunity to enhance digital advertising, social media campaigns, and customer engagement strategies to attract a broader, tech-savvy demographic. Market Positioning Positioned as a trendy, fun American-themed venue with live music and late-night offerings, American Social attracts a diverse crowd seeking entertainment and dining experiences. This presents sales opportunities with beverage and entertainment providers, event equipment suppliers, and promotional partners aligned with nightlife and hospitality industries. Growth and Revenue With revenue estimates ranging from $10 million to $50 million and ongoing new openings despite challenges like the pandemic, there are potential opportunities for partnership in franchise development, supply chain expansion, and innovative menu or service offerings aimed at increasing customer lifetime value and operational efficiency. American Social Bar and Kitchen Food and Beverage Services United States 201-500 Employees Open for Brunch on Saturday and Sunday, and Lunch and Dinner daily, American Social boasts a full menu of classic American dishes made from scratch, inspired by flavors from throughout America. With a late night menu, American Social provides a great late night bar and lounge atmosphere serving food until midnight or later.

AmSo has a fun and relaxed atmosphere that is both trendy and fun.  With locations in Fort Lauderdale, Miami, Tampa, and soon to be Orlando (Spring 2019) AmSo is the place to be, and to be seen.  American Social's ambiance is second to none...  from it's Chicago brick walls, adorned with classic Time magazine covers celebrating all the biggest moments in American history, to the many TV's that line the bar, and the live music and DJ's, American Social is a great place to eat and drink for anyone looking for a good time.

At the end of the day, the best part of American Social is its staff and guests. Loyal, energetic, and motivated, staff and guests alike come to American Social to dine, drink, and socialize in a safe and fun environment.
